Installation

# Installation

## Get up and running with RainbowKit

[**Quick start**](#quick-start)

You can scaffold a new RainbowKit + [wagmi](https://wagmi.sh) \+ [Next.js](https://nextjs.org) app with one of the following commands, using your package manager of choice:

```

npm init @rainbow-me/rainbowkit@latest

# or

pnpm create @rainbow-me/rainbowkit@latest

# or

yarn create @rainbow-me/rainbowkit

```

Copy

This will prompt you for a project name, generate a new directory containing a boilerplate project, and install all required dependencies.

Alternatively, you can manually integrate RainbowKit into your existing project.

[**Manual setup**](#manual-setup)

Install RainbowKit and its peer dependencies, [wagmi](https://wagmi.sh/), [viem](https://viem.sh), and [@tanstack/react-query](https://tanstack.com/query/v5).

```

npm install @rainbow-me/rainbowkit wagmi viem@2.x @tanstack/react-query

```

Copy

> Note: RainbowKit is a [React](https://reactjs.org/) library.

[**Import**](#import)

Import RainbowKit, Wagmi and TanStack Query.

```

import '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit/styles.css';

import {
  getDefaultConfig,
  RainbowKitProvider,
} from '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit';

import { WagmiProvider } from 'wagmi';

import {
  mainnet,
  polygon,
  optimism,
  arbitrum,
  base,
} from 'wagmi/chains';

import {
  QueryClientProvider,
  QueryClient,
} from "@tanstack/react-query";

```

Copy

[**Configure**](#configure)

Configure your desired chains and generate the required connectors. You will also need to setup a `wagmi` config. If your dApp uses server side rendering (SSR) make sure to set `ssr` to `true`.

> Note: Every dApp that relies on WalletConnect now needs to obtain a `projectId` from [WalletConnect Cloud](https://cloud.walletconnect.com/). This is absolutely free and only takes a few minutes.

```

...

import { getDefaultConfig } from '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit';

const config = getDefaultConfig({

  appName: 'My RainbowKit App',

  projectId: 'YOUR_PROJECT_ID',

  chains: [mainnet, polygon, optimism, arbitrum, base],

  ssr: true, // If your dApp uses server side rendering (SSR)

});

```

Copy

[**Wrap providers**](#wrap-providers)

Wrap your application with `RainbowKitProvider`, [`WagmiProvider`](https://wagmi.sh/react/api/WagmiProvider#wagmiprovider), and [`QueryClientProvider`](https://tanstack.com/query/v4/docs/framework/react/reference/QueryClientProvider).

```

const queryClient = new QueryClient();

const App = () => {

  return (

    <WagmiProvider config={config}>

      <QueryClientProvider client={queryClient}>

        <RainbowKitProvider>

          {/* Your App */}

        </RainbowKitProvider>

      </QueryClientProvider>

    </WagmiProvider>

  );

};

```

Copy

[**Add the connect button**](#add-the-connect-button)

Then, in your app, import and render the `ConnectButton` component.

```

import { ConnectButton } from '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit';

export const YourApp = () => {

  return <ConnectButton />;

};

```

Copy

RainbowKit will now handle your user's wallet selection, display wallet/transaction information and handle network/wallet switching.

[**Additional build tooling setup**](#additional-build-tooling-setup)

Some build tools will require additional setup.

[**Remix**](#remix)

When using [Remix](https://remix.run), you must polyfill `buffer`, `events` and `http` modules. Reference the Remix configuration below, or [our sample Remix project](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/blob/main/examples/with-remix).

```

/** @type {import('@remix-run/dev').AppConfig} */

export default {

  ignoredRouteFiles: ["**/.*"],

  browserNodeBuiltinsPolyfill: {

    modules: { buffer: true, events: true, http: true },

  },

};

```

Copy

[**Preparing to deploy**](#preparing-to-deploy)

By default, your dApp uses public RPC providers for each chain to fetch balances, resolve ENS names, and more. This can often cause reliability issues for your users as public nodes are rate-limited. You should instead purchase access to an RPC provider through services like [Alchemy](https://www.alchemy.com/) or [QuickNode](https://www.quicknode.com/), and define your own Transports in Wagmi. This can be achieved by adding the `transports` param in `getDefaultConfig` or via Wagmi's `createConfig` directly.

A Transport is the networking middle layer that handles sending JSON-RPC requests to the Ethereum Node Provider (like Alchemy, Infura, etc).

**Example with an `http` transport**

```

import { getDefaultConfig } from '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit';

import { http } from 'wagmi';

import { mainnet, sepolia } from 'wagmi/chains';

const config = getDefaultConfig({

  appName: 'My RainbowKit App',

  projectId: 'YOUR_PROJECT_ID',

  chains: [mainnet, sepolia],

  transports: {

    [mainnet.id]: http('https://eth-mainnet.g.alchemy.com/v2/...'),

    [sepolia.id]: http('https://eth-sepolia.g.alchemy.com/v2/...'),

  },

});

```

Copy

For more details, view the [wagmi transport docs](https://wagmi.sh/core/api/transports#transports).

[**Add your own functionality**](#add-your-own-functionality)

Now that your users can connect their wallets, you can start building out the rest of your app using [wagmi.](https://wagmi.sh)

Send transactions, interact with contracts, resolve ENS details and much more with wagmiâ€™s comprehensive suite of React Hooks.

For more detail, view the [wagmi documentation.](https://wagmi.sh)

[**Further examples**](#further-examples)

To see some running examples of RainbowKit, or even use them to automatically scaffold a new project, check out the [official examples](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples).

To try RainbowKit directly in your browser, check out the CodeSandbox links below:

- with [Create React App](https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/github/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-create-react-app)

- with [Next.js](https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/github/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-next)

- with [Next.js App Router](https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/github/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-next-app)

- with [Remix](https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/github/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-remix)

- with [Vite](https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/github/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-vite)


[PreviousMigration Guide](/docs/migration-guide)

YerelleÅŸtirme

# YerelleÅŸtirme

## Dahili Ã§evirilerle dApp'inizin dilini Ã¶zelleÅŸtirme

VarsayÄ±lan olarak, RainbowKit, Ä°ngilizce dil kullanÄ±cÄ±larÄ± iÃ§in `en-US` yerelini destekler.

Mevcutsa, RainbowKit kullanÄ±cÄ±nÄ±n [tercih edilen dilini](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Navigator/language) algÄ±lar ve uygun Ã§evirileri seÃ§er. GeliÅŸtiriciler her zaman varsayÄ±lan dili geÃ§ersiz kÄ±labilir.

KullanÄ±cÄ±larÄ±nÄ±z iÃ§in bir dil belirtmek iÃ§in, sadece `RainbowKitProvider`'Ä±nÄ±zda bir prop olarak `locale="zh-CN"` ekleyin

```

import { RainbowKitProvider } from '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit';

export const App = () => (

  <RainbowKitProvider locale="zh-CN" {...etc}>

    {/* Your App */}

  </RainbowKitProvider>

);

```

Copy

[**Next.js ile KullanÄ±m**](#nextjs-ile-kullanÄ±m)

RainbowKit'in yerelleÅŸtirme desteÄŸi, [Alt-yol YÃ¶nlendirmesi](https://nextjs.org/docs/pages/building-your-application/routing/internationalization#sub-path-routing) ile daha iyi Ã§alÄ±ÅŸÄ±r.

AÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki Ã¶rnekte olduÄŸu gibi Next.js projenizi yapÄ±landÄ±rÄ±n ve rotalarÄ±nÄ±za isteÄŸe baÄŸlÄ± bir `/locale/` alt yolu ekleyin, bu, arama motorlarÄ±nÄ±n ve kullanÄ±cÄ±larÄ±n Ã§ok dilli desteÄŸinizi daha iyi keÅŸfetmelerine yardÄ±mcÄ± olacaktÄ±r.

```

// next.config.js

{

  i18n: {

    locales: ['default', 'en', 'zh-CN'],

    defaultLocale: 'default',

  },

}

```

Copy

Sonra, Sayfalar YÃ¶nlendiricisi tarafÄ±ndan saÄŸlanan `locale`'yi `RainbowKitProvider`'a geÃ§irin

```

import { RainbowKitProvider, Locale } from '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit';

export const App = () => {

  const { locale } = useRouter() as { locale: Locale };

  return (

    <RainbowKitProvider locale={locale} {...etc}>

      {/* Your App */}

    </RainbowKitProvider>

  )

};

```

Copy

Sayfalar YÃ¶nlendiricisi iÃ§in bir Ã¶rneÄŸi buradan [here](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-next) referans alabilirsiniz.

Uygulama YÃ¶nlendiricisi henÃ¼z i18n'yi desteklemiyor. En iyi uygulama tekniklerini [`next-intl`](https://github.com/amannn/next-intl) ara yazÄ±lÄ±mÄ± ile implemente etmek iÃ§in ayrÄ± Ã¶rneÄŸimize [here](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-next-app-i18n) bakÄ±nÄ±z.

DApp'inizin iÃ§eriÄŸini tam lokalizasyon desteÄŸi iÃ§in Ã§evirmek iÃ§in aynÄ± teknikleri kullanmanÄ±z Ã¶nerilir. [`i18n-js`](https://github.com/fnando/i18n) ve [`next-intl`](https://github.com/amannn/next-intl) gibi lokalizasyon kÃ¼tÃ¼phaneleri ve Crowdin gibi yÃ¶netim araÃ§larÄ± bu sÃ¼reci basitleÅŸtirecektir.

[**Desteklenen Diller**](#desteklenen-diller)

AÅŸaÄŸÄ±daki `locale` bÃ¶lgeleri iÃ§in tam destek saÄŸlarÄ±z:

| Dil | BÃ¶lge | Yerel Ayar | KÄ±sa BiÃ§im |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| English | United States ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ | `en-US` | `en` |
| ä¸­æ–‡ | Mainland China ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ | `zh-CN` | `zh-Hans` | zh |
| ç¹é«”ä¸­æ–‡ | Hong Kong ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡° | `zh-HK` |
| ç¹é«”ä¸­æ–‡ | Taiwan ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ | `zh-TW` | `zh-Hant` |
| à¤¹à¤¿à¤‚à¤¦à¥€ | India ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ | `hi-IN` | `hi` |
| EspaÃ±ol | Latin America ğŸŒ | `es-419` | `es` |
| FranÃ§ais | France ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· | `fr-FR` | `fr` |
| Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø±Ø¨ÙŠØ© | Middle East ğŸŒ | `ar-AR` | `ar` |
| PortuguÃªs | Brazil ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡· | `pt-BR` | `pt` |
| Ğ ÑƒÑÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ | Russia ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º | `ru-RU` | `ru` |
| Bahasa Indonesia | Indonesia ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡© | `id-ID` | `id` |

EÄŸer ek bir dil desteÄŸi gÃ¶rmek isterseniz, lÃ¼tfen bir [GitHub TartÄ±ÅŸmasÄ±](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/discussions/new?category=ideas) aÃ§Ä±n ve biz bunu en kÄ±sa sÃ¼rede desteklemek iÃ§in Ã§alÄ±ÅŸacaÄŸÄ±z.

RainbowKit

ConÃ§u pour tous. Construit pour les dÃ©veloppeurs.

## Essayez RainbowKit

Donnez Ã  votre expÃ©rience de connexion Ethereum une ambiance familiale sur votre site web. RainbowKit vous permet de personnaliser entiÃ¨rement la couleur, le rayon de la bordure, les fournisseurs de portefeuille et bien plus encore, le tout grÃ¢ce Ã  une API facile Ã  utiliser. Testez-le ci-dessous !

# Connecter un portefeuille

Populaire

Rainbow

Coinbase Wallet

Un foyer pour vos actifs numÃ©riques

Les portefeuilles sont utilisÃ©s pour envoyer, recevoir, stocker et afficher des actifs numÃ©riques comme Ethereum et les NFTs.

Une nouvelle faÃ§on de se connecter

Au lieu de crÃ©er de nouveaux comptes et mots de passe sur chaque site Web, connectez simplement votre portefeuille.

Obtenir un portefeuille
[En savoir plus](https://learn.rainbow.me/understanding-web3?utm_source=rainbowkit&utm_campaign=learnmore)

# Connecter un portefeuille

Populaire

Coinbase Wallet

fill="%23000" fill-opacity=".6" d="m32.202 36.63 4.297 2.54v-4.493l-4.297 1.953Z"/><defs><linearGradient id="a" x1="24" x2="24" y1="0" y2="48" gradientUnits="userSpaceOnUse"><stop stop-color="%23D2D8E4"/><stop offset="1" stop-color="%23C2C9D6"/></linearGradient></defs></svg>)

Un foyer pour vos actifs numÃ©riques

Les portefeuilles sont utilisÃ©s pour envoyer, recevoir, stocker et afficher des actifs numÃ©riques comme Ethereum et les NFTs.

Localization

# Localization

## Customizing your dApp's language with built-in translations

By default, RainbowKit supports the `en-US` locale for English language users.

If available, RainbowKit will detect the user's [preferred language](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Navigator/language) and choose the appropriate translations. Developers can always override the default language.

To specify a language for your users, just add `locale="zh-CN"` as a prop in your `RainbowKitProvider`

```

import { RainbowKitProvider } from '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit';

export const App = () => (

  <RainbowKitProvider locale="zh-CN" {...etc}>

    {/* Your App */}

  </RainbowKitProvider>

);

```

Copy

[**Using with Next.js**](#using-with-nextjs)

RainbowKit's localization support works even better with [Sub-path Routing](https://nextjs.org/docs/pages/building-your-application/routing/internationalization#sub-path-routing).

Configure your Next.js project like the example below to add an optional `/locale/` sub-path to your routes, which will help search engines and users better discover your multi-lingual support.

```

// next.config.js

{

  i18n: {

    locales: ['default', 'en', 'zh-CN'],

    defaultLocale: 'default',

  },

}

```

Copy

Then pass the `locale` provided by the Pages Router to the `RainbowKitProvider`

```

import { RainbowKitProvider, Locale } from '@rainbow-me/rainbowkit';

export const App = () => {

  const { locale } = useRouter() as { locale: Locale };

  return (

    <RainbowKitProvider locale={locale} {...etc}>

      {/* Your App */}

    </RainbowKitProvider>

  )

};

```

Copy

You can reference an example for the Pages Router [here](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-next).

App Router does not yet support i18n. Reference our separate example [here](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-next-app-i18n) for implementation best practices with [`next-intl`](https://github.com/amannn/next-intl) middleware.

It is recommended that you use the same techniques to translate your dApp's content for full localization support. Localization libraries like [`i18n-js`](https://github.com/fnando/i18n) and [`next-intl`](https://github.com/amannn/next-intl) and management tools like Crowdin will simplify this process.

[**Supported Languages**](#supported-languages)

We provide full support for the following `locale` regions:

| Language | Region | Locale | Shortform |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| English | United States ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ | `en-US` | `en` |
| ä¸­æ–‡ | Mainland China ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ | `zh-CN` | `zh-Hans` | zh |
| ç¹é«”ä¸­æ–‡ | Hong Kong ğŸ‡­ğŸ‡° | `zh-HK` |
| ç¹é«”ä¸­æ–‡ | Taiwan ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¼ | `zh-TW` | `zh-Hant` |
| à¤¹à¤¿à¤‚à¤¦à¥€ | India ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡³ | `hi-IN` | `hi` |
| EspaÃ±ol | Latin America ğŸŒ | `es-419` | `es` |
| FranÃ§ais | France ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· | `fr-FR` | `fr` |
| Ø§Ù„Ø¹Ø±Ø¨ÙŠØ© | Middle East ğŸŒ | `ar-AR` | `ar` |
| PortuguÃªs | Brazil ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡· | `pt-BR` | `pt` |
| Ğ ÑƒÑÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ | Russia ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º | `ru-RU` | `ru` |
| Bahasa Indonesia | Indonesia ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡© | `id-ID` | `id` |
| æ—¥æœ¬èª | Japan ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ | `ja-JP` | `ja` |
| TÃ¼rkÃ§e | Turkey ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· | `tr-TR` | `tr` |
| í•œêµ­ì–´ | South Korea ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· | `ko-KR` | `ko` |
| à¸ à¸²à¸©à¸²à¹„à¸—à¸¢ | Thailand ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ | `th-TH` | `th` |
| ÑƒĞºÑ€Ğ°Ñ—Ğ½ÑÑŒĞºĞ° | Ukraine ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ | `uk-UA` | `ua` |
| Tiáº¿ng Viá»‡t | Vietnam ğŸ‡»ğŸ‡³ | `vi-VN` | `vi` |
| Deutsch | Germany ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª | `de-DE` | `de` |
| Bahasa Melayu | Malaysia ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡¾ | `ms-MY` | `ms` |

If you would like to see support for an additional language, please open a [GitHub Discussion](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/discussions/new?category=ideas) and we'll work to support it as soon as possible.

[PreviousChains](/docs/chains)

[AuthenticationNext](/docs/authentication)![Rainbow logo](/rainbow.svg)

RainbowKit

# RainbowKit

## é’±åŒ…ç™»å½•çš„æœ€ä½³æ–¹å¼

ä¸ºæ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·è®¾è®¡ã€‚ä¸ºå¼€å‘è€…å¼€å‘ã€‚

`npm init @rainbow-me/rainbowkit@latest` Copy

## è¯•ç”¨ä¸€ä¸‹ RainbowKit

è®©ä»¥å¤ªï¼ˆEthereumï¼‰ç™»å½•çš„ä½“éªŒåœ¨æ‚¨çš„ç½‘ç«™ä¸Šç›¸å¾—ç›Šå½°ã€‚é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜“äºä½¿ç”¨çš„ API å®ç°å¯¹é¢œè‰²ã€è¾¹æ¡†åŠå¾„ã€å„ç§é’±åŒ… App çš„æ”¯æŒã€åŠæ›´å¤šåŠŸèƒ½çš„å®šåˆ¶ã€‚åœ¨ä¸‹é¢çš„è¿™ä¸ª Demo é‡Œæ¥è¯•ç”¨ä¸€ä¸‹å§ï¼

Argent

Omni

Argent

Omni

RainbowKit

# RainbowKit

## Cara terbaik untuk menghubungkan dompet

Dirancang untuk semua orang. Dibangun untuk pengembang.

`npm init @rainbow-me/rainbowkit@latest` Copy

[Lihat Dokumentasi](/id/docs)

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%272352%27%20height=%271704%27/%3e)![](/_next/image?url=%2Fhero-modal.png&w=3840&q=75)

![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%271068%27%20height=%271344%27/%3e)![](/_next/image?url=%2Fhero-compact.png&w=3840&q=75)

Tim Web3 terbaik menggunakan RainbowKit untuk meningkatkan produk mereka, menyenangkan pengguna mereka, dan menghemat waktu saat membangun.

## Coba RainbowKit

Buat pengalaman login Ethereum Anda terasa seperti di rumah di situs web Anda. RainbowKit memungkinkan Anda untuk sepenuhnya menyesuaikan warna, jari-jari batas, penyedia dompet, dan banyak lagi â€” semuanya melalui API yang mudah digunakan. Coba rasakan di bawah ini!

# Hubungkan Dompet

Populer

Sebuah Rumah untuk Aset Digital Anda

Dompet digunakan untuk mengirim, menerima, menyimpan, dan menampilkan aset digital seperti Ethereum dan NFTs.

Cara Baru untuk Masuk

Alih-alih membuat akun dan kata sandi baru di setiap situs web, cukup hubungkan dompet Anda.

Dapatkan Dompet
[Pelajari lebih lanjut](https://learn.rainbow.me/understanding-web3?utm_source=rainbowkit&utm_campaign=learnmore)

# Hubungkan Dompet

Populer

Sebuah Rumah untuk Aset Digital Anda

Dompet digunakan untuk mengirim, menerima, menyimpan, dan menampilkan aset digital seperti Ethereum dan NFTs.

## Rainbow ğŸ¤ Pengembang

RainbowKit menyediakan cara yang cepat, mudah, dan sangat dapat disesuaikan bagi pengembang untuk menambahkan pengalaman dompet yang hebat ke aplikasi mereka. Kami menangani hal-hal sulit sehingga pengembang dan tim dapat fokus membangun produk dan komunitas yang luar biasa untuk pengguna mereka.

- Tick
Instalasi Mudah

- Tick
Tema Kustom

- Tick
Tema Bawaan

- Tick
Daftar Dompet Kustom

- Tick
Mode Terang dan Gelap

- Tick
Rantai Kustom

- Tick
Integrasi App Store dan Google Play

- Tick
Tombol Koneksi Kustom

## Dibuat dengan â¤ï¸ oleh teman-teman Anda di![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)![](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

Membangun RainbowKit telah menjadi upaya yang sangat menyenangkan di antara banyak orang di Rainbow dan teman-teman kami di perusahaan lain. Kami selalu berusaha membuat RainbowKit lebih baik, jadi harap beri tahu kami bagaimana kami bisa meningkatkan.

[Ikuti kami di Twitter](https://twitter.com/rainbowdotme) [Berikan masukan kepada kami](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/discussions/new?category=feedback)

RainbowKit

# RainbowKit

## The best way to connect a wallet

Designed for everyone. Built for developers.

`npm init @rainbow-me/rainbowkit@latest` Copy

[View the Docs](/docs)

## Give RainbowKit a spin

Make your Ethereum login experience feel right at home on your website. RainbowKit allows you to fully customize color, border radius, wallet providers and a lot more â€” all through an easy-to-use API. Get a feel for it below!

# Connect a Wallet

A Home for your Digital Assets

Wallets are used to send, receive, store, and display digital assets like Ethereum and NFTs.

![](data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 48 48"><path fill="url(%23a)" d="M0 16c0-5.6 0-8.4 1.09-10.54a10 10 0 0 1 4.37-4.37C7.6 0 10.4 0 16 0h16c5.6 0 A New Way to Log In

Instead of creating new accounts and passwords on every website, just connect your wallet.

Get a Wallet
[Learn More](https://learn.rainbow.me/understanding-web3?utm_source=rainbowkit&utm_campaign=learnmore)

# Connect a Wallet

Popular

A Home for your Digital Assets

Wallets are used to send, receive, store, and display digital assets like Ethereum and NFTs.

![](data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 48 48"><path fill="url(%23a)" d="M0 16c0-5.6 0-8.4 1.09-10.54a10 10 0 0 1 4.37-4.37C7.6 0 10.4 0 16 0h16c5.6 0 ## Rainbow ğŸ¤ Developers

RainbowKit provides a fast, easy and highly customizable way for developers to add a great wallet experience to their application. We handle the hard stuff so developers and teams can focus on building amazing products and communities for their users.

## RainbowKit'i deneyin

Ethereum oturum aÃ§ma deneyiminizi web sitenizde tamamen Ã¶zelleÅŸtirebilirsiniz. RainbowKit, renk, kenar yarÄ±Ã§apÄ±, cÃ¼zdan saÄŸlayÄ±cÄ±larÄ± ve daha fazlasÄ±nÄ± tamamen kullanÄ±cÄ± dostu bir API aracÄ±lÄ±ÄŸÄ±yla Ã¶zelleÅŸtirmenize olanak tanÄ±r. AÅŸaÄŸÄ±da bir his alÄ±n!

Dijital VarlÄ±klarÄ±nÄ±z Ä°Ã§in Bir Ev

Yeni Bir GiriÅŸ Yolu

Her web sitesinde yeni hesap ve parolalar oluÅŸturmak yerine, sadece cÃ¼zdanÄ±nÄ±zÄ± baÄŸlayÄ±n.

Bir CÃ¼zdan Edinin
[Daha fazla bilgi edinin](https://learn.rainbow.me/understanding-web3?utm_source=rainbowkit&utm_campaign=learnmore)

Rainbow

# RainbowKit

## CÃ¡ch tá»‘t nháº¥t Ä‘á»ƒ káº¿t ná»‘i vÃ­ ğŸŒˆ

RainbowKit lÃ  má»™t thÆ° viá»‡n [React](https://reactjs.org/) giÃºp dá»… dÃ ng thÃªm káº¿t ná»‘i vÃ­ vÃ o á»©ng dá»¥ng dapp cá»§a báº¡n. NÃ³ trá»±c quan, pháº£n há»“i nhanh vÃ  cÃ³ thá»ƒ tÃ¹y chá»‰nh.

[**TÃ­nh nÄƒng**](#tÃ­nh-nÄƒng)

[**Quáº£n lÃ½ vÃ­**](#quáº£n-lÃ½-vÃ­)

Quáº£n lÃ½ vÃ­ sáºµn cÃ³ cho á»©ng dá»¥ng dapp cá»§a báº¡n. NgoÃ i viá»‡c xá»­ lÃ½ káº¿t ná»‘i vÃ  ngáº¯t káº¿t ná»‘i vÃ­, RainbowKit há»— trá»£ nhiá»u vÃ­, chuyá»ƒn Ä‘á»•i giá»¯a cÃ¡c chuá»—i káº¿t ná»‘i, giáº£i quyáº¿t Ä‘á»‹a chá»‰ tá»›i ENS, hiá»ƒn thá»‹ sá»‘ dÆ° vÃ  nhiá»u hÆ¡n ná»¯a!

[**CÃ³ thá»ƒ tÃ¹y chá»‰nh**](#cÃ³-thá»ƒ-tÃ¹y-chá»‰nh)

Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ tÃ¹y chá»‰nh giao diá»‡n UI cá»§a RainbowKit Ä‘á»ƒ phÃ¹ há»£p vá»›i thÆ°Æ¡ng hiá»‡u cá»§a mÃ¬nh. Báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ chá»n tá»« má»™t vÃ i mÃ u sáº¯c nháº¥n Ä‘á»‹nh sáºµn vÃ  cáº¥u hÃ¬nh cÃ¡c bÃ¡n kÃ­nh viá»n. Äá»‘i vá»›i cÃ¡c trÆ°á»ng há»£p sá»­ dá»¥ng nÃ¢ng cao hÆ¡n, báº¡n cÃ³ thá»ƒ cung cáº¥p má»™t chá»§ Ä‘á» tÃ¹y chá»‰nh hoÃ n toÃ n, thiáº¿t káº¿ nÃºt cá»§a riÃªng báº¡n vÃ  bá» qua má»™t sá»‘ tÃ­nh nÄƒng nháº¥t Ä‘á»‹nh. Bao gá»“m cháº¿ Ä‘á»™ tá»‘i.

[**TiÃªu chuáº©n ngÃ nh**](#tiÃªu-chuáº©n-ngÃ nh)

Äá»ƒ tÆ°Æ¡ng tÃ¡c tá»‘t hÆ¡n vá»›i háº§u háº¿t cÃ¡c sáº£n pháº©m, chÃºng tÃ´i dá»±a vÃ o [viem](https://viem.sh) vÃ  [wagmi](https://wagmi.sh/) â€” cÃ¡c thÆ° viá»‡n Ä‘Æ°á»£c sá»­ dá»¥ng phá»• biáº¿n nháº¥t trong lÄ©nh vá»±c nÃ y.

CÃ¡c tiÃªu chuáº©n vÃ­ nhÆ° EIP-1193 vÃ  EIP-6963 Ä‘Æ°á»£c há»— trá»£ ngay tá»« Ä‘áº§u, lÃ m cho ngÆ°á»i dÃ¹ng vÃ­ trÃ¬nh duyá»‡t cÃ³ thá»ƒ káº¿t ná»‘i vÃ­ vá»›i dapp cá»§a báº¡n má»™t cÃ¡ch dá»… dÃ ng hÆ¡n bao giá» háº¿t.

[**Cá»™ng Ä‘á»“ng**](#cá»™ng-Ä‘á»“ng)

ChÃºng tÃ´i ráº¥t hÃ¡o há»©c khi tháº¥y cá»™ng Ä‘á»“ng cháº¥p nháº­n RainbowKit, nÃªu ra váº¥n Ä‘á» vÃ  cung cáº¥p pháº£n há»“i. DÃ¹ lÃ  yÃªu cáº§u tÃ­nh nÄƒng, bÃ¡o cÃ¡o lá»—i hay má»™t dá»± Ã¡n trÃ¬nh diá»…n, hÃ£y tham gia vÃ o!

- NÃªu má»™t [váº¥n Ä‘á»](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/issues)

- Theo dÃµi trÃªn [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rainbowdotme)

- Chia sáº» [pháº£n há»“i cá»§a báº¡n](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/discussions/new?category=feedback)

- Thá»­ nÃ³ trÃªn [Codesandbox](https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/github/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-next)


[HÆ°á»›ng Dáº«n Di Chuyá»ƒnNext](/vi/docs/migration-guide)![Rainbow logo](/rainbow.svg)

RainbowKit

### à¸ à¸²à¸à¸£à¸§à¸¡

[à¸šà¸—à¸™à¸³](/th/docs/introduction) [à¸„à¸¹à¹ˆà¸¡à¸·à¸­à¸à¸²à¸£à¸¢à¹‰à¸²à¸¢](/th/docs/migration-guide)

### à¹€à¸£à¸´à¹ˆà¸¡à¸•à¹‰à¸™à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸‡à¸²à¸™

[à¸à¸²à¸£à¸•à¸´à¸”à¸•à¸±à¹‰à¸‡](/th/docs/installation) [ConnectButton](/th/docs/connect-button) [à¸‚à¸™à¸²à¸”à¸‚à¸­à¸‡ Modal](/th/docs/modal-sizes) [à¸˜à¸µà¸¡](/th/docs/theming) [à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¹‚à¸¢à¸‡](/th/docs/chains) [à¸à¸²à¸£à¹à¸›à¸¥à¸ à¸²à¸©à¸²](/th/docs/localization) [à¸à¸²à¸£à¸•à¸£à¸§à¸ˆà¸ªà¸­à¸šà¸•à¸±à¸§à¸•à¸™](/th/docs/authentication) [à¸˜à¸¸à¸£à¸à¸£à¸£à¸¡à¸¥à¹ˆà¸²à¸ªà¸¸à¸”](/th/docs/recent-transactions)

### à¸‚à¸±à¹‰à¸™à¸ªà¸¹à¸‡

[à¸•à¸±à¸§à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¸•à¹ˆà¸­ Modal](/th/docs/modal-hooks) [à¸›à¸¸à¹ˆà¸¡à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¸•à¹ˆà¸­à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸‡](/th/docs/custom-connect-button) [à¸˜à¸µà¸¡à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸‡](/th/docs/custom-theme) [à¸£à¸²à¸¢à¸à¸²à¸£à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸‡](/th/docs/custom-wallet-list) [à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸‡](/th/docs/custom-wallets) [à¹€à¸Šà¸™à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸‡](/th/docs/custom-chains) [à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸¡à¸¹à¸¥à¹à¸­à¸›à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸‡](/th/docs/custom-app-info) [à¸­à¸§à¸²à¸•à¸²à¸£à¹Œà¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸‡](/th/docs/custom-avatars) [à¸à¸²à¸£à¸£à¸±à¸šà¸£à¸­à¸‡à¸„à¸§à¸²à¸¡à¸–à¸¹à¸à¸•à¹‰à¸­à¸‡à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹€à¸­à¸‡](/th/docs/custom-authentication) [à¸›à¸¸à¹ˆà¸¡à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™](/th/docs/wallet-button) [à¹‚à¸«à¸¡à¸”à¹€à¸—à¹ˆà¸«à¹Œ](/th/docs/cool-mode)

à¸šà¸—à¸™à¸³

# RainbowKit

## à¸§à¸´à¸˜à¸µà¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸”à¸µà¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸ªà¸¸à¸”à¹ƒà¸™à¸à¸²à¸£à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¸•à¹ˆà¸­à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™ ğŸŒˆ

RainbowKit à¸„à¸·à¸­ [React](https://reactjs.org/) à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸—à¸³à¹ƒà¸«à¹‰à¸‡à¹ˆà¸²à¸¢à¸•à¹ˆà¸­à¸à¸²à¸£à¹€à¸à¸´à¹ˆà¸¡à¸à¸²à¸£à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¸•à¹ˆà¸­à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™à¹€à¸‚à¹‰à¸²à¸à¸±à¸š dapp à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸„à¸¸à¸“. à¸¡à¸±à¸™à¹€à¸›à¹‡à¸™à¸™à¸±à¹ˆà¸‡à¸•à¸£à¸‡à¸ˆà¸¸à¸”, à¸•à¸­à¸šà¸ªà¸™à¸­à¸‡ à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸ªà¸²à¸¡à¸²à¸£à¸–à¸›à¸£à¸±à¸šà¹à¸•à¹ˆà¸‡à¹„à¸”à¹‰.

[**à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¸ªà¸¡à¸šà¸±à¸•à¸´**](#à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¸ªà¸¡à¸šà¸±à¸•à¸´)

[**à¸à¸²à¸£à¸ˆà¸±à¸”à¸à¸²à¸£à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™**](#à¸à¸²à¸£à¸ˆà¸±à¸”à¸à¸²à¸£à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™)

à¸à¸²à¸£à¸ˆà¸±à¸”à¸à¸²à¸£à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¹€à¸ªà¸£à¹‡à¸ˆà¸ªà¸¡à¸šà¸¹à¸£à¸“à¹Œà¸ªà¸³à¸«à¸£à¸±à¸š dapp à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸„à¸¸à¸“. à¸™à¸­à¸à¸ˆà¸²à¸à¸à¸²à¸£à¸ˆà¸±à¸”à¸à¸²à¸£à¸à¸²à¸£à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¸•à¹ˆà¸­à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸«à¸¢à¸¸à¸”à¸à¸²à¸£à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¸•à¹ˆà¸­à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™ à¸£à¸§à¸¡à¸–à¸¶à¸‡à¸§à¸´à¸˜à¸µà¸à¸²à¸£à¸£à¸­à¸‡à¸£à¸±à¸šà¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™à¸«à¸¥à¸²à¸¢à¸•à¸±à¸§, à¸à¸²à¸£à¹à¸¥à¸à¹€à¸›à¸¥à¸µà¹ˆà¸¢à¸™à¸ªà¸²à¸¢à¸à¸²à¸£à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¸•à¹ˆà¸­, à¹à¸à¹‰à¹„à¸‚à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸­à¸¢à¸¹à¹ˆà¹€à¸›à¹‡à¸™ ENS, à¹à¸ªà¸”à¸‡à¸¢à¸­à¸”à¸„à¸‡à¹€à¸«à¸¥à¸·à¸­ à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸­à¸µà¸à¸¡à¸²à¸à¸¡à¸²à¸¢!

[**à¸ªà¸²à¸¡à¸²à¸£à¸–à¸›à¸£à¸±à¸šà¹à¸•à¹ˆà¸‡à¹„à¸”à¹‰**](#à¸ªà¸²à¸¡à¸²à¸£à¸–à¸›à¸£à¸±à¸šà¹à¸•à¹ˆà¸‡à¹„à¸”à¹‰)

à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¸ªà¸²à¸¡à¸²à¸£à¸–à¸›à¸£à¸±à¸š UI à¸‚à¸­à¸‡ RainbowKit à¹ƒà¸«à¹‰à¸•à¸£à¸‡à¸à¸±à¸šà¹à¸šà¸£à¸™à¸”à¹Œà¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸„à¸¸à¸“. à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¸ªà¸²à¸¡à¸²à¸£à¸–à¹€à¸¥à¸·à¸­à¸à¸ªà¸µà¹€à¸™à¹‰à¸™à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸à¸²à¸£à¸•à¸±à¹‰à¸‡à¸„à¹ˆà¸²à¸£à¸±à¸¨à¸¡à¸µà¸‚à¸­à¸šà¸ˆà¸²à¸à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¹„à¸§à¹‰à¸¥à¹ˆà¸§à¸‡à¸«à¸™à¹‰à¸². à¸ªà¸³à¸«à¸£à¸±à¸šà¸à¸²à¸£à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸‡à¸²à¸™à¹ƒà¸™à¸£à¸°à¸”à¸±à¸šà¸ªà¸¹à¸‡à¸‚à¸¶à¹‰à¸™ à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¸ªà¸²à¸¡à¸²à¸£à¸–à¸à¸³à¸«à¸™à¸”à¸˜à¸µà¸¡à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¹€à¸­à¸‡à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸—à¸±à¹‰à¸‡à¸«à¸¡à¸”, à¹à¸ªà¸”à¸‡à¸›à¸¸à¹ˆà¸¡à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¹€à¸­à¸‡à¹à¸¥à¸°à¸¥à¸°à¹€à¸§à¹‰à¸™à¸šà¸²à¸‡à¸Ÿà¸µà¹€à¸ˆà¸­à¸£à¹Œ. à¸£à¸§à¸¡à¹‚à¸«à¸¡à¸”à¸¡à¸·à¸”.

[**à¸¡à¸²à¸•à¸£à¸à¸²à¸™à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸­à¸¸à¸•à¸ªà¸²à¸«à¸à¸£à¸£à¸¡**](#à¸¡à¸²à¸•à¸£à¸à¸²à¸™à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸­à¸¸à¸•à¸ªà¸²à¸«à¸à¸£à¸£à¸¡)

à¹€à¸à¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸à¸²à¸£à¸—à¸³à¸‡à¸²à¸™à¸£à¹ˆà¸§à¸¡à¸à¸±à¸™à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸”à¸µà¸‚à¸¶à¹‰à¸™à¸à¸±à¸šà¸œà¸¥à¸´à¸•à¸ à¸±à¸“à¸‘à¹Œà¸ªà¹ˆà¸§à¸™à¹ƒà¸«à¸à¹ˆ à¹€à¸£à¸²à¸à¸¶à¹ˆà¸‡à¸à¸²à¸šà¸™ [viem](https://viem.sh) à¹à¸¥à¸° [wagmi](https://wagmi.sh/) â€” à¸„à¸·à¸­à¹„à¸¥à¸šà¸£à¸²à¸£à¸µà¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸‡à¸²à¸™à¸¡à¸²à¸à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸ªà¸¸à¸”à¹ƒà¸™à¸ªà¹€à¸›à¸‹à¸™à¸µà¹‰.

à¸¡à¸²à¸•à¸£à¸à¸²à¸™à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™à¹€à¸Šà¹ˆà¸™ EIP-1193 à¹à¸¥à¸° EIP-6963 à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸£à¸±à¸šà¸à¸²à¸£à¸ªà¸™à¸±à¸šà¸ªà¸™à¸¸à¸™à¸­à¸¢à¹ˆà¸²à¸‡à¹€à¸•à¹‡à¸¡à¸£à¸¹à¸›à¹à¸šà¸šà¹‚à¸”à¸¢à¸—à¸±à¸™à¸—à¸µ à¸—à¸³à¹ƒà¸«à¹‰à¸œà¸¹à¹‰à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™à¸šà¸™à¹€à¸šà¸£à¸²à¸§à¹Œà¹€à¸‹à¸­à¸£à¹Œà¸ªà¸²à¸¡à¸²à¸£à¸–à¹€à¸Šà¸·à¹ˆà¸­à¸¡à¸•à¹ˆà¸­à¸à¸£à¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‹à¸²à¹€à¸‡à¸´à¸™à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸à¸§à¸à¹€à¸‚à¸²à¸à¸±à¸š dApp à¸‚à¸­à¸‡à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸­à¸¢à¹ˆà¸²à¸‡à¸£à¸²à¸šà¸£à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¸¢à¸´à¹ˆà¸‡à¸‚à¸¶à¹‰à¸™.

[**à¸Šà¸¸à¸¡à¸Šà¸™**](#à¸Šà¸¸à¸¡à¸Šà¸™)

à¹€à¸£à¸²à¸•à¸·à¹ˆà¸™à¹€à¸•à¹‰à¸™à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸ˆà¸°à¹€à¸«à¹‡à¸™à¸Šà¸¸à¸¡à¸Šà¸™à¸™à¸³à¹„à¸›à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰ RainbowKit à¹à¸ˆà¹‰à¸‡à¸›à¸±à¸à¸«à¸² à¹à¸¥à¸°à¹ƒà¸«à¹‰à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¹€à¸ªà¸™à¸­à¹à¸™à¸°. à¹„à¸¡à¹ˆà¸§à¹ˆà¸²à¸ˆà¸°à¹€à¸›à¹‡à¸™à¸„à¸³à¸‚à¸­à¹€à¸à¸´à¹ˆà¸¡à¸„à¸¸à¸“à¸ªà¸¡à¸šà¸±à¸•à¸´ à¸£à¸²à¸¢à¸‡à¸²à¸™à¸‚à¹‰à¸­à¸œà¸´à¸”à¸à¸¥à¸²à¸” à¸«à¸£à¸·à¸­à¹‚à¸›à¸£à¹€à¸ˆà¸„à¸—à¸µà¹ˆà¸ˆà¸°à¹à¸ªà¸”à¸‡ à¹‚à¸›à¸£à¸”à¸¡à¸²à¸£à¹ˆà¸§à¸¡à¹€à¸‚à¹‰à¸²à¸£à¹ˆà¸§à¸¡!

- à¸¢à¸·à¹ˆà¸™ [issue](https://github.com/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/issues)

- à¸•à¸´à¸”à¸•à¸²à¸¡à¹„à¸”à¹‰à¸—à¸µà¹ˆ [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rainbowdotme)

- à¸—à¸”à¸¥à¸­à¸‡à¹ƒà¸Šà¹‰à¸—à¸µà¹ˆ [Codesandbox](https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/github/rainbow-me/rainbowkit/tree/main/examples/with-next)
